Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Votes.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Title: Establishes the position of expert insurance liaison within the department of homeland security and emergency services
Summary: Establishes the position of expert insurance coordinator to coordinate and facilitate information sharing among local, state, and federal agencies to improve coordination with insurance companies with respect to disaster response to natural and man-made disasters.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing an expert insurance liaison in the department of homeland security and emergency services and a communication relay system
